title: Belt, ca. 1896
medium:
Medium: beads, hide
Technique: beads strung and wrapped around leather core
description: Belt made in two pieces to be fastened at sides with button and thong closures. Heavy cord solidly covered with red beads, with stripes of blue and white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Belt, ca. 1896.Medium: beads, hide
Technique: beads strung and wrapped around leather core. 1969-98-10-d,e.
